prod_short_desc: Enjoy pizza with friends at Heartlake’s Italian restaurant!
prod_long_desc:
The LEGO® Friends Heartlake Pizzeria has all the equipment needed to play at making and baking fresh pizza in the kitchen. Serve them out on the restaurant balcony, or use the phone to take orders then deliver them with Oliver on the scooter. There’s even a stand selling basil and tomato plants to happy customers. Includes two mini-doll figures.
Build the best pizzeria in town and use the delivery scooter to feed Emma and Oliver’s hungry customers
Includes Emma and Oliver mini-doll figures
Pizzeria building measures over 5” high, 4” wide and 4” long. Delivery scooter measures over 1” high, 2” long and 1” wide
LEGO Friends building toys are compatible with all LEGO construction sets for creative building
289 pieces – For boys and girls between the ages of 5 and 12 years old
